@NaomiOhReally But where one is interviewed as a specialist in a certain topic the journalist unlikely to have the knowledge to fact-check.
@NaomiOhReally I agree it is not warranted in the political sphere.
@NaomiOhReally There is a difference between reporting on the political and the technical or scientific, where I think it would be helpful
@NaomiOhReally That is a lot easier to get if you are a politician or public figure.
@NaomiOhReally What about a situation where one interviewed as an "expert" on a topic a journalist could not possibly fact check. What then?
@NaomiOhReally No. And I assume that a greater effort would be made to ensure details are right in such a case. But my experiences not great
Given that what is written is available to all in perpuity it is imperative to get facts right @alex_meehan @colette_sexton @NaomiOhReally
@NaomiOhReally I have been regularly misquoted in articles and also had incorrect "facts" included. It is as a courtesy that I offer to read
